Articles.Content:
Hi guys! I am a satellite enthusiast from Singapore I was searching for some help with my project online actually, I stumbled upon this website and found it very useful as a discussion platform.

Satellite education just launched in Singapore years ago. So it will definitely be good if I can hear some advice from you guys.

Currently I am in a project group where there are five guys with different interest. Propulsion, transceiver board, microcontroller, radiation detection...I am wondering what kind of group project will be suitable for us? How to fit our interest into one design scenario?

Sorry for spamming a bit but thats basically what I have been thinking. Greetings:)
Hello Aerograce. We have many forum members with a similar background.
Welcome aboard! The Science Labs are the place for you. Good luck with your work, that sounds awesome!
